Venmo
Plus, no fees until April
The way you love to pay friends on Venmo
is now a better way to do business.
Friends can share where they’ve shopped and what they’ve bought, putting you in the spotlight—and helping you gain new customers.
Switch from your business to personal profile using the same login. Track business transactions separately for simple bookkeeping.
Get paid from the Venmo app, or in-person with your unique business QR code—both are easy, touch-free ways to pay.
Try business profiles out for zero transaction fees until April 2021. After that, we'll charge 1.9% + $0.10 per transaction.
